Job Title: Walk in For Senior Backend .net Developer- Bannerghatta NCG Office
Venue: Tata Consultancy Services, Brigade Bhuwalka Icon 40, Pattandur Agrahara, ITPL Main Road, Whitefield, Bengaluru - 560066
Job Description:
Greetings from TCS Recruitment Team!


For all those Outsystem Developer, we are coming bigger with the plan of Walk In Drive on 31st Aug 2024(Saturday) in Bengaluru Locations. It is a Walk in Drive planned to attract great Talents in Outsystem Developer. We believe that your skills and expertise are a better match for the skills we are looking for.


Skill: Outsystem Developer

Years of experience : 4 to12 Years

Walk-In-Drive Location: Bengaluru


Walk-in-Location Details:

Tata Consultancy Services, Brigade Bhuwalka Icon 40, Pattandur Agrahara, ITPL Main Road, Whitefield, Bengaluru - 560066

Drive Time: 9 am to 1:00 PM


Eligibility Criteria:

  • Minimum 15 years of regular education (10th + 12th + 3 years graduation)
  • BE/B.Tech/MCA/M.Sc/MS with minimum 2 years of relevant experience post Qualification IT- Experience.
  • B.Sc/BCA Graduates with minimum 2.5 years of relevant experience post qualification IT Experience.
  • Only Full Time courses would be considered.

Things to carry for interview:

1 copy of an updated resume, Government ID proof(and photocopy), 1 passport size photo, 1 copy of Double covid-19 vaccination certificate, TCS Application form


Job Description

• Experience in working with database and designing data models
• Industry experience in building applications and services in Outsystems for web and/or mobile
• At Least 2 years experience as outsystems developer
• Knowledge of HTML, CSS and Javascript
• Good understanding of MVC architecture
• Should be proficient with web services (REST and SOAP)
• A keen problem solving mindset to meet the needs of the customers


If the JD is matching to you skills, kindly share your CV at the earliest.


Please connect for skills, other details and to register.

Please forward the same to your friends and colleagues, who are looking for change in Outsystem.


Looking forward to connect!!!

Job Title: Field Relationship Executive
Venue: Surya Wave Tech Park, Electronics City Phase 1, Electronic City, Bengaluru-100
Job Description:
Position Summary


The fulfilment by an insurer of its obligation to receive, investigate and act on a claim filed by an insured. It involves multiple administrative and customer service layers that includes review, investigation, adjustment (if necessary), remittance or denial of the claim.


Roles and Responsibilities


  • Understand the basic professional standards and established procedures, policies before taking action and making decisions
  • Processing claims and handling calls, as per the process guidelines.
  • Adhering to the service level and understanding Quality & Auditing parameters
  • Assume responsibility for work and coordinating efforts
  • Meeting assigned productivity goals
  • Adhere to attendance and punctuality norms
  • Acquiring knowledge & skills of related areas of the process
  • Interpersonal relationship at work with peers, supervisors and should not have any recorded instance of misconduct

Education & Experience


  • Any Graduates (Except BE\B Tech)
  • 0 - 1 year of experience in a BPO

Desired Skills and Abilities


  • Knowledge on US health care
  • Good Oral and Written Communication Skill in English
  • Awareness of Telephonic Etiquettes & MS Office suite
  • Good Typing Skills & Basic computer Navigation Skills

Interested candidates, kindly reach out to the below mentioned Talent Acquisition team members

Sindhu 9901048371

Hitesh 9019586534

Hunain 8553894993

Job Title: IndusInd Bank | MEGA WALK-IN Drive For DBM/RM/KAM @ Chennai
Venue: Tata Consultancy Services, Brigade Bhuwalka Icon 40, Pattandur Agrahara, ITPL Main Road, Whitefield, Bengaluru - 560066 & Tata Consultancy Services Ltd, Kumaran Nagar, 415/21-24, TNHB Main Rd, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600119
Job Description:
Greetings from TCS Recruitment Team!


For all those ServiceNow, we are coming bigger with the plan of Walk In Drive on 31st Aug 2024(Saturday) in Bengaluru & Chennai Locations. It is a Walk in Drive planned to attract great Talents in ServiceNow. We believe that your skills and expertise are a better match for the skills we are looking for.


Skill: ServiceNow

Years of experience : 4 to12 Years

Walk-In-Drive Location: Bengaluru & Chennai


Walk-in-Location Details:

Tata Consultancy Services, Brigade Bhuwalka Icon 40, Pattandur Agrahara, ITPL Main Road, Whitefield, Bengaluru - 560066

&

Tata Consultancy Services Ltd, Kumaran Nagar, 415/21-24, TNHB Main Rd, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600119

Drive Time: 9 am to 1:00 PM


Eligibility Criteria:

  • Minimum 15 years of regular education (10th + 12th + 3 years graduation)
  • BE/B.Tech/MCA/M.Sc/MS with minimum 2 years of relevant experience post Qualification IT- Experience.
  • B.Sc/BCA Graduates with minimum 2.5 years of relevant experience post qualification IT Experience.
  • Only Full Time courses would be considered.

Things to carry for interview:

1 copy of an updated resume, Government ID proof(and photocopy), 1 passport size photo, 1 copy of Double covid-19 vaccination certificate, TCS Application form


Job Description

  • Experience as a Technical Lead
    • Experienced in ITIL Process Definition, Integration Solutions, understanding Architecture
    solution
    • Understanding customer business requirements and convert to functional requirements
    • Responsible for reviewing requirements for accurate estimation
    • Experienced in leading at least a couple of Implementation projects in ITSM area and one
    complete Implementation lifecycle for ServiceNow
    • Expertise ServiceNow deployments, ITSM migrations, conslidations, upgrades, integration
    with other third party tools, Orchestration, operational activities, Project Management
    expertise
    • Review, and do proactive analyze and resolve application issues as needed
    • Mentor and share technical knowledge/guidance to team
    • Very good ITIL process knowledge and ability to evaluate and bring out the correlations and
    impacts with respect to customer requirements and ITIL / industry standards
    • Must be certified with ServiceNow Systems Administrator, ServiceNow Implementation
    Specilist and ITIL V3 foundation
    • Should possess good knowledge in Agile/Scrum methodology

If the JD is matching to you skills, kindly share your CV at the earliest.


Please connect for skills, other details and to register.

Please forward the same to your friends and colleagues, who are looking for change in ServiceNow.


Looking forward to connect!!!

Job Title: IGT || Interviews For Banking Process
Venue: A-88, A Block, Sector 2, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301 (View on map)
Job Description:
About BU:

Jeevansathi is one of the largest and most trusted matrimony websites in India. It has a large presence across all parts of the country and its two decades of existence has left an indelible impact on millions of lives. The platform provides a very secure and convenient matchmaking experience to all its members by ensuring 100% screening, exclusive privacy options, photo protection features and multiple ways of verification amongst other things.


Job Objective: The objective of this role is to sell paid services to the already registered members of the platform via chat/inbound process.


Job Description:

  • Work on system qualified and high income Leads of already registered users to convert them from Free to Paid or Upgrade.
  • Sell membership plans over any of these communication channels - phone/chat/video call and update all the details accurately in the CRM software.
  • Achieve sales targets by counseling the registered users of Jeevansathi.com by selling High-Value packs.
  • Maintain communication quality standards as per the defined metrics.
  • Maximize profitability by ensuring higher conversion of leads from calls and chat.

Required Skills:

  • Excellent communication skills (both written as well as verbal)
  • Active listening skills
  • Strong convincing skills
  • Client handling skills
  • Chat proficiency
  • Comfortable with Rotation Offs

WFH (Work from Home) after 3 months of mandatory training in WFO (Work from office) mode, and afterwards depending upon performance, either WFH or WFO.

Job Title: Oracle Apps Finance Consultant
Venue: TCS Synergy park, Indian Immunologicals Colony, Gachibowli, Hyderabad, Telangana 500032
Job Description:
JOB ROLE: FILENET DEVELOPER


Role & responsibilities :

  • Extensive Working experience in IBM FileNet 5.2.x and 5.5.x version products installation, configuration, upgrade and enhancement of all mandatory components CPE, ICN, CMIS, CSS.
  • Hands on experience in in place as well shift and lift of FileNet applications (all components).
  • Working knowledge on IBM Websphere (all versions) installation, configuration, upgrade, creation of profiles, deployment of ear files, performance tuning.
  • Working knowledge on FileNet Deployment Manager (FDM).
  • Working experience on performance tuning of FileNet applications in terms of infrastructure stability.

Preferred candidate profile

  • Minimum 15 years of regular education (10th + 12th + 3 years graduation)
  • BE/B.Tech/MCA/M.Sc/MS with minimum 4 years of relevant experience post Qualification IT- Experience.
  • B.Sc/BCA Graduates with minimum 4.5 years of relevant experience post qualification IT Experience.
  • Only Full Time courses would be considered.

Job Title: Back Office Executive
Venue: HDFC Sales Pvt. Ltd., Office No P-02/149, 1st Floor, Harmony Plaza, Tarapur Road, Boisar (W) 401501
Job Description:
Designation: Sales Officer Mortgage Sales


Role/Functional Area: Sales/Business Development


Location: Boisar


Address: HDFC Sales Pvt. Ltd., Office No P-02/149, 1st Floor, Harmony Plaza, Tarapur Road, Boisar (W) 401501


Experience: 0.6 year 2 years


Salary Range: Up to 3LPA + Incentives


Roles & Responsibilities:


1. Area/ Lane /Geography Mapping:

Responsible for lane to lane/ Area mapping of Area/ Geography at regular intervals with the help of supervisor. Identify new sources in the allocated Area/ Geography and inform the progress to reporting manager during team huddle.


2. Source Relationship Management:

Responsible for managing the relationship with all sources assigned and identified by him in his geography/area.


3. Maintain Reports:

Responsible for maintaining reports related to sales and all his activities in the prescribed format. Should maintain diary on daily basis in the prescribed format of activities.


4. Channel Partner Recruitment:

Responsible for identifying the need for appointment of a channel partner


5. Team Huddle:

Responsible for attending team huddle on a daily basis as per the set process.


6. Customer Relationship Management:

Responsible for enhancing the customer experience by developing and maintaining relationship with customers.


7. Completion of File:

Responsible for submission of complete application form, documentations and information


Desired candidate profile:


1. Must be a graduate from any stream

2. Should have minimum 6 months of experience in sales

3. Candidates with prior experience in BFSI will have an added advantage

4. Open to travel

5. Must have good communication skills

Job Description:
Greetings from Kotak Mahindra Bank!

We at Kotak Mahindra Bank are looking for dynamic sales professionals for the following positions (On the payroll of Kotak Mahindra Bank)


1. Branch Relationship Manager - Business Development (NTB Acquisition - HNI Clients) - Grade: M2 : Deputy Manager


Maximum Age Limit : 30 Years


KRAs:

  • Responsible for NTB acquisition of customers.
  • Responsible for successfully contacting 20 customers per day.
  • Responsible for meeting 4 customers/ prospects per day.
  • Responsible for upgrading customers from a lower product category to high

Desired Candidate Profile:


  • Good communication skills
  • Comfortable working in a full fledged sales profile / NTB Acquisition Customer orientation
  • High energy levels with a motive to succeed
  • Graduation qualification in any stream
  • Applicants with 1-3 Years of experience currently working in CASA Sales roles can apply

Date : 11th September 2024 - Wednesday


Time : 12:00PM to 3:00PM


Address : Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. "Trilok Heights", LT Road, Mulund (East), Mumbai - 400 081


During the interview, you will have the chance to discuss your background, experiences, and aspirations with our hiring team.


Looking forward to meet You!

Job Title: MEGA WALK-IN DRIVE TECH Mahindra || B19 SEC-62 NOIDA OPP DME College
Venue: Telus International, UG FLoor Tower-6, Candor Tech Space, Noida Sec 135, Uttar Pradesh
Job Description:
Role & responsibilities


1. Analyze and solve customer queries through calls.

2. Assist execution and implementation of process improvements in the CRM team in consultation with Team Lead.

3. Improve the Customers Experience with the Client Services by ensuring that the Customers Issues are attended promptly and all their concerns are resolved immediately.

4. Ensure that all the Company Policies and procedures, code of conduct and regulatory guidelines are strictly complied to while servicing the customers.

5. Suggest effective ways through which the Client can promote its products and services and increase customer satisfaction.

6. Provide splendid customer services to customers in a friendly and courteous manner at all times.

7. Have sufficient knowledge about the products and services and respond to all inquiries accordingly.

8. Think creatively and make innovative suggestions that improve operational efficiency, effectiveness, internal controls or customer service.


Preferred candidate profile


1. Should possess excellent verbal and written English communication skill.

2. Should be customer oriented and team oriented as well.

3. Fresher/Experienced can apply(0-3 years).

4. Work Location: Candor Tech Space, Noida Sector 135(Delhi NCR)

5. Undergraduate freshers are not eligible.

6. Candidate should be okay with Work from Office role.

7. Should be comfortable with night shifts


Perks and benefits


1. Annual Package would be in the range of 3.2 to 3.45 LPA.

2. Cab Facilities.

3. Medicare Facility(free online consultation with Doc)


Interested Candidates can come for Walk-in directly

Venue: : Telus International, UG FLoor Tower-6, Candor Tech Space, Noida Sec 135, Uttar Pradesh

Timings: 12- 4 PM.

Venue: INTERVIEW VENUE - PUNE: Infosys BPM Limited, Taluka Mulshi Plot No. 1, Phase 1 Rajiv Gandhi Infotech Park, Building B1, ground floor, Hinjewadi, Pune, Maharashtra 411057.
Job Description:
Walk-In Interview for "Dot Net-Full stack Developer with React JS" on 11th & 13th(Only diversity) Sep-24 at Pune


Greeting from Infosys BPM Ltd.,


JOB SUMMARY:


Role: Dot Net-Full stack Developer with React JS

Experience: (2 years-4 Years). 2+ yrs of project experience is mandatory (excluding Bench period, Training & Internships).

Education: Bachelors(UG) or Masters(PG) in Computer Science.

Shifts: WFO (24*7/Rotational week off).


INTERVIEW DETAILS:

Interview Date: 11th & 13th(Only Diversity) Sep-24

Interview Time: 09:00 AM till 01:00 PM

INTERVIEW VENUE - PUNE:

Infosys BPM Limited, Taluka Mulshi Plot No. 1, Phase 1 Rajiv Gandhi Infotech Park, Building B1, ground floor, Hinjewadi, Pune, Maharashtra 411057.


JOB DESCRIPTION:

  • Proficient in .NET Core, ASP.NET Core MVC, C#, MVC, Angular, Web API, .NET MVC, SQL Server,
  • Strong understanding of software development methodologies and agile development principles.
  • A front-end framework (React / Vue / Angular), preferably ReactJS.

REGISTRATION PROCESS:


The Candidate ID & SHL Test(AMCAT ID) is mandatory to attend the interview. Please follow the below instructions to successfully complete the registration. (Talents without registration & assessment will not be allowed for the Interview).


Candidate ID Registration process:

  • STEP 1: Visit: https://career.infosys.com/joblist
  • STEP 2: Click on "Register" and provide the required details and submit.
  • STEP 3: Once submitted, Your Candidate ID(100XXXXXXXX) will be generated.
  • STEP 4: The candidate ID will be shared to the registered Email ID.

SHL Test(AMCAT ID) Registration process:


This assessment is proctored, and talent gets evaluated on Basic analytics, English Comprehension and writex (email writing).


  • STEP 1: Visit: https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fautologin-talentcentral.shl.com%2F%3Flink%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Famcatglobal.aspiringminds.com%2F%3Fdata%%3D%26apn%3Dcom.shl.talentcentral%26ibi%3Dcom.shl.talentcentral%26isi%3D1551117793%26efr%3D1&data=05%7C02%7Comar.muqtar%40infosys.com%7Ca7ffe71a4fe4404f3dac08dca01c0bb3%7C63ce7d592f3e42cda8ccbe764cff5eb6%7C0%7C0%7C638561289526257677%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=s28G3ArC9nR5S7J4j%2FV1ZujEnmYCbysbYke41r5svPw%3D&reserved=0
  • STEP 2: Click on "Start new test" and follow the instructions to complete the assessment.
  • STEP 3: Once completed, please make a note of the AMCAT ID( Access you Amcat id by clicking 3 dots on top right corner of screen).

NOTE:

  • During registration, you'll be asked to provide the following information:
  • Personal Details: Name, Email Address, Mobile Number, PAN number.
  • Availability: Acknowledgement of work schedule preferences (Shifts, Work from Office, Rotational Weekends, 24/7 availability, Transport Boundary) and reason for career change.
  • Employment Details: Current notice period and total annual compensation (CTC) in the format 390000 - 4 LPA (example).
  • Candidate Information: 10-digit candidate ID starting with 100XXXXXXX, Gender, Source (e.g., Vendor name, Naukri/LinkedIn/Found it, or Direct), and Location
  • Interview Mode: Walk-in
  • Attempt all questions in the SHL Assessment app.
  • The assessment is proctored, so choose a quiet environment.
  • Use a headset or Bluetooth headphones for clear communication.
  • A passing score is required for further interview rounds.
  • 5 or above toggles, multi face detected, face not detected, or any malpractice will be considered rejected
  • Once you've finished, submit the assessment and make a note of the AMCAT ID (15 Digit) used for the assessment.

THINGS TO CARRY FOR INTERVIEW:

  • Please have a note of Candidate ID & AMCAT ID along with registered Email ID.
  • Please do not carry laptops/cameras to the venue as these will not be allowed due to security restrictions.
  • Please carry 2 set of updated Resume/CV (Hard Copy).
  • Please carry original ID proof for security clearance.
  • Please carry individual headphone/Bluetooth for the interview.

BEST REGARDS

Job Description:
Job Title: Service Officer / Service Executive / Senior Service Executive / Service Specialist


Candidates with Graduate Must


Age Criteria - till 33


FRESHERS CAN ALSO APPLY


Experience- Min 6+ Months to year Tele calling


Perks and Benefits:

On-time salary every month of 30th/31st

Sales incentive.

PF, ESIC, and Gratuity facilities.

Every year salary increments & promotions.

Leaves benefits.

Learning & development continuous training facilities.


Role Overview:

The Telesales & Service Associate of Bharat Matrimony sells paid memberships over the phone to clients who are looking for matrimony alliances. The job is to reach out to various customers over the phone, explain to them the product & features, and deliver value to the customers.


Key Responsibilities

Responsible for making outbound calls and regular follow-ups on leads assigned. Build a strong relationship/trust with customers by understanding the customer requirements and suggesting the right product to the Customers.

Selling Membership over the phone and achieving the targeted sales numbers & value, setting quality parameters

Explaining the product features in detail and how to use the packages.

Understand the Customer requirements, and encourage them to upgrade/renew the matrimony packages.

Address all the issues/grievances of customers and provide the right customer experience. Capture the insights from customer interactions and share them with the internal team. Strictly adhere to the process requirements

Skill and Competencies required:


Functional

Business Knowledge Process Knowledge

Product Knowledge

Customer Orientation

Language skills English / Regional language

Telemarketing / Selling Skills

Basic computer skills MS Excel, Word


Behavioral

Values Integrity / Honesty / Respect

Communication Oral & Written skills / Listening

Executive Presence

Business / Telephone Etiquette

Influencing Skills

Empathy

Self-driven / Initiative

Ability to manage stress

Willingness to learn

Salary: 12,600.00 - 17,500.00 per month

Venue: Ground floor ,IGT Solutions Pvt. Ltd, Infotech Centre, Old ground floor Delhi Gurgaon Road, Floor, Dundahera, Gurgaon 1220016
Job Description:
WALKIN DRIVE AT IGT for a Voice Process


IGT Solutions is a leading customer experience (CX) company, specializing in AI-led transformative experiences for global brands in the Travel and High Growth Tech industries. With a focus on digital and human intelligence, IGT manages end-to-end CX journeys, providing services to 85 renowned customers worldwide. Established in 1998, IGT operates in 30 delivery centers across various countries, employing over 25,000 customer experience and technology specialists.


Contact Person: Romica (9811802409)

Interview Time: 10:00 AM 3:00 PM IST
Interview / Work Location: Interglobe Technologies Solutions, Ground floor, InfoTech Centre, Milestone 14/2, Old Delhi Gurugram Road, Dhundahera, Gurugram - 122016, Haryana, Nearest Metro station: Sikanderpur/Guru Dronacharya

  • Handling the customer queries over inbound calls. Upselling is also included
  • Identify and assess customers needs to achieve satisfaction
  • Build sustainable relationships and trust with the customer accounts through open and interactive communication
  • Ability to work in a 24/7 environment.

  • Required candidate profile:
  • Graduate fresher or experienced can apply (NO UNDERGRADUATES)
  • Comfortable in both English and Hindi languages
  • Able to hold up the conversation

Note: Carry a hard copy of your resume. Mention "Romica" on resume.

Venue: Matrimony.com limited, No. 61/2145 D2 D3 & D4, Coastal Chambers, 3rd Floor, MG Road, Ravipuram Perumanoor P.O Cochin - 682015
Job Description:
Role & responsibilities : Welcoming the customer on-board and create a Member Profile • Understanding the member choice, expectations and identifying the uniqueness of the Member • Searching, screening, short listing, establishing contact, initiating meeting between members and creating success stories • Maintaining good rapport with the member; providing the right Elite experience and delivering quality service • Managing a set customer portfolio with robust follow up
